Probably my favorite game of all time. GLaDOS will always be my favorite video character and it has both good story and good gameplay. Highly recommend.

Fantastic game. A huge improvement on the original, with more gameplay variety, great narrative surprises, some of the best writing and voice acting I’ve experienced in a game, topped off with a healthy dose of humour. Highly recommended.
Its a very fun game! Great Story too!

Portal 2 is probably one of the best puzzle games I've ever played.

Pros:

Excellent Graphics and Gameplay
Mindbending puzzles that deep fried my mind, but it was worth it getting deep fried.
The game is long and keeps you entertained even until the end
More puzzles then the original Portal 1

Cons:
My computer almost died in the process of trying to load the .exe file
Some of the characters occasionally use words such as "Damn", but no words such as "f***" or "s***" or anything too harsh.
Requires a mid-end or high end PC.


All in all, this was a great game. Would highly recommend.

Not only my favourite valve game, probably my favourite puzzle game too. The graphics were wonderful, the plot was interesting, and most importantly the puzzles were mind-bendingly fun. If you haven't yet, do yourself a favour and buy this game.

This game is a pinnacle of how great Valve can be as a story telling developer..  Portal is one of the greatest games I've ever played.

When I played Portal 1, I felt like the game was just beginning and then I beat the final boss and got credits. I always disliked how short it felt. Not here. Portal 2 has proper pacing, an interesting, yet unintrusive storyline and good new puzzles and gimmicks that don't overstay their welcome.
One of the best games i've ever played
ta bueno compralo y esta barato (en descuento)

Pour résumé rapidement, c'est exactement comme le premier Portal, mais avec plein de nouvelle fonctionnalité/possibilité de déplacements dans les salles de tests etc...

Quant à l'histoire, elle est vraiment meilleure que le premier volet. Tout au long du jeu nous sommes accompagné d'un robot qui sera notre "bras droit" et qui nous aideras à sortir du complexe d'Aperture Science.

Le mode histoire se termine en moins de 6H, ce n'est pas énorme, mais ça reste tout de même appréciable

Le jeu est doté d'un mode coop, qui est lui aussi super bien réussi, je n'y ai pas énormément joué, mais ça reste toujours cool

On a aussi la possibilité d'ajouter des nouvelles "salles de tests" grace au workshop de Steam, qui permet au joueur de créer leurs propres niveaux, ce qui ajoute évidemment des heures de gameplay de plus !

Pour conclure cette évaluation en une phrase, foncez les yeux fermés si vous avez aimé Portal 1 !

Like the original Portal, Portal 2 has many puzzles that increase in difficulty as the game progresses.  It adds new elements and a Co-op mode, but maintains the humor that the original set the tone for.  In my opinion, this game is better in many ways than the original- Valve really "upped their game". It's just a shame that Valve  gave up creating new games when they launched their popular Steam platform.  I would have loved another Portal game to complete a trilogy.
Amazing story and fun puzzles, graphics still hold up in 2022
